name: Twin Tube Washing Machine
details:
• Generous Capacity: Suitable for medium to large laundry loads.
  • Semi-Automatic: Combines convenience with control over wash cycles.
  • Dual Tubs: Separate wash and spin tubs for multitasking.
  • Quick Drying: Air Turbo Drying System reduces drying time.
  • Rust-Proof Body: Durable build withstands humid conditions.
  • Lint Filter: Traps lint and debris for clean clothes and clear drainage.
  • Waterfall Effect: Ensures thorough soaking and cleaning.
  • Easy Controls: Intuitive design for easy operation.
